description: a caricature of Henry Simon Thomassin; full length; standing in profile to right; wearing long curly wig, knee length coat; hunched
inscription:
Title, and Inscription

on sheet below image in  black: HENRY SIMON THOMASSIN / A celebrated Engraver died at Paris / 1741.  Aged 53 / For an account of him see / Strutts Dictionary | on sheet in pencil: 2-469
title: Henry Simon Thomassin A celebrated Engraver died at Paris 1741. Aged 53
